name: KONSERV™ Oxygen Scavenger
description: KONSERV™ Oxygen Scavenger eliminates the need for costly oxygen-absorbing devices by extending the shelf life of food and non-consumable products. Reduces mold growth, delays non-enzymatic browning and retains flavor by preventing oxidation. This is designed to protect the health and well-being of both people and planet, our performance additives serve to reduce environmental impact while profoundly enhancing the behavior and beneficial properties of plastic.
